name: Greek Quinoa Picnic Salad

ingredients.name: Greek Dressing Mix or  Za'atar Seasoning

preparation: Rinse quinoa; place in Round Steamer. Combine with broth. Cover; microwave on high for 15 min or until tender.
Meanwhile, in Cruet, combine dressing mix, oil, and vinegar; shake well. Cut tomatoes in halves and dice cucumber.
When quinoa is cooked, stir in 1⁄4 cup dressing, tomatoes, cucumber, baby kale or spinach and cheese. Taste and add more dressing, if needed. Sprinkle with toppings, if desired.
tips: Make and serve straight from the Round Steamer.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein such as grilled chicken, and 2 cups leafy greens—add it right to the salad and add more dressing, if desired.

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavours of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!

products.name: Vegetable Broth Mix
summary: Make a tasty vegetable broth in a matter of seconds! Same garden-fresh flavour as making it from scratch—just add water!

products.name: Greek Dressing Mix
summary: Herbs make salad dressings taste great, but they can be a pain to buy and use while fresh. Enter our Greek Dressing to solve the problem. Packed with only good food ingredients, including garlic, oregano, mint, and zero additives, it’s easy to make your own healthy dressing with this simple blend. Just mix it with olive oil and red wine vinegar and give it a shake. Add crumbled feta or Greek yogurt for a creamier dressing.

products.name: Za’atar Seasoning
summary: Bring home restaurant-style Middle Eastern flavours with this multi-purpose blend designed to kick mealtime boredom to the curb!

products.name: Round Steamer
summary: A must-have tool for every kitchen! Our game-changing silicone Round Steamer cooks food faster and more evenly in the microwave. Bring a whole, juicy Roast Chicken to the table in 20 minutes, perfectly cook fluffy grains, baked potatoes, and tender veggies, or meal prep soups and chowders for easy weeknight meals. The possibilities are endless!
